about_the_game:
A collection of cozy holiday music written for DemonCrawl's Christmas event! Available in both FLAC and MP3 formats.

These tracks appear during the Christmas seasonal event in the following game locations:

  • Main menu
  • Overworld (stage select)
  • Item shop
  • Santa boss theme
  • Bad Santa variation
  • BONUS: The final track appears on New Year's Eve for only a few hours!

name: DemonCrawl Christmas Soundtrack
